definitions.title: vb. Ithpe.
definitions.body: be distressed (cf. [[כַּרְיָא]] III. adj. suffering, [[כְּ רִיוּחָא]] n. id. D:WB 197; Syr. kro0 be short, abridged, keryat ly it grieved me; karyuwto0 pain, grief; cf. As. kûru, pain; also krah (der. spec.) be ill, Ar. kariha dislike, shrink from);—Pf. 3 ms. [[אִתְכְּכְּ רִיַת רוּחִי]] (K:§ 47. Beisp. 2) DnDa 7:15.
